titles.title: Teacher Training in Technology Flexibility Act
Tech Flex Act

To amend the Technology for Education Act of 1994 to clarify the authority for, and to encourage, the use of Federal funds for incentives for school personnel to participate in professional development relating to the use of technology in education, and in the development of technology applications.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary: 10/27/1999--Introduced. Teacher Training in Technology Flexibility Act (or the Tech Flex Act) - Amends the Technology for Education Act of 1994 (which is title III of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965) to revise provisions for Federal leadership, State and local applications, local uses of funds, and national challenge grants to provide for use of funds for release time and other incentives for teachers and other appropriate personnel to participate in professional development relating to the use of technology in education and in the development of technology applications.
